page.title: 05T.O.P.S.Holidays
page.content: Travel Outdoor Pursuits Services is a small developing company based in Ross _on_Wye.In this village TOPS occupies the old vicarage,where they offer {activity holidays all year round}to families & school parties.Visitors can stay for{2,3 or 7 days.}16 staff can cope with 72 visitors.The activities available are:canoeing(2types)archery, rifle shooting,computer work,disco,BMX bicycles,assault course,horse trekking { Daily Timetable }evening walks. {7.00 am get up } All{activities {8.30 am breakfast }are{supervised {9.30 am activities }by{qualified {1.00 pm lunch staff}at{all {2.00 pm activities times.}School {6.00 pm evening meal }parties require {7.30 pm activities }1 teacher for {10.00pm bedtime }every 10 pupils {NO FREE TIME GIVEN
